p: Acute dengue case. A symptomatic participant with less than 7 days of onset of symptoms who tested positive for dengue evidenced by: 1) detection of dengue NS1 antigen, 2) detection of IgM antibodies to dengue virus by ELISA, 3) detection of IgG capture antibodies to dengue virus, or 4) detection of DENV RNA by Trioplex Real-time RT-PCR [ 29â€“ 34].
